item.title: Services
item.description: Design West Builders Corp is a Montana-based building firm specializing in custom residential and light commercial construction, woodworking, design and planning. Design West Builders has served Missoula and the Western Montana area since the 1980’s, and has been incorporated since 1992. State of Montana Contractor License #8183 General Contracting Subcontracting for all types of woodworking Design and Drafting services Planning, navigating the code, permit applications Referrals upon request
